title: Shatrughan Sinha blasts Mukesh Khanna for jibe at Sonakshi Sinha's upbringing: 'Who appointed him guardian of Hinduism' - Hindustan Times
summary:
Shatrughan Sinha blasts Mukesh Khanna for jibe at Sonakshi Sinha's upbringing

Date: Dec 18, 2024
Source: Hindustan Times

Shatrughan Sinha has come to the defense of his daughter, Sonakshi Sinha, after actor Mukesh Khanna criticized her upbringing following her inability to answer a question about the Ramayana on a quiz show.

  • Mukesh Khanna criticized Sonakshi Sinha for not knowing a Ramayana answer on KBC.
  • Shatrughan Sinha questions Khanna's authority to comment on Hinduism.
  • Sonakshi's response highlighted the gender bias in Khanna's remarks.
  • Shatrughan expressed pride in Sonakshi's achievements and defended her character.
“Not answering a question on the Ramayana doesn’t disqualify Sonakshi from being a good Hindu. She doesn’t need a certificate of approval from anyone.” - Shatrughan Sinha

This public dispute highlights the ongoing conversation around celebrity culture, online scrutiny, and personal autonomy in the public eye.
newTitle: Shatrughan Sinha defends daughter Sonakshi against Mukesh Khanna's remarks

title: Pushpa 2 The Rule stampede: Show cause notice issued to theatre management after woman's death at Sandhya theatre - Hindustan Times
summary:
Pushpa 2 The Rule Stampede: Show Cause Notice Issued to Sandhya Theatre for '11 Lapses' After Woman's Death at Premiere

Publication Date: December 12, 2023 | Source: Hindustan Times

The Hyderabad police has issued a show cause notice to Sandhya Theatre for lapses leading to a woman's death during the premiere of Allu Arjun's 'Pushpa 2'.

  • The notice outlines 11 alleged lapses by the theatre management.
  • Management failed to inform police about Allu Arjun's arrival, leading to crowd mismanagement.
  • No proper guidance for entry and exit points, encouraging crowd gathering without permission.
  • Inadequate security arrangements resulted in the tragic incident.
  • A case registered against Allu Arjun and theatre management following a complaint from the deceased woman's family.
  • A medical update indicated the boy injured in the incident is in stable condition but still requires intensive care.
“The neurological condition is severely impacted. The doctors have opined that it will be a long haul before any improvements can be seen.”

The incident has raised significant concerns about safety protocols at major events, highlighting the need for strict adherence to crowd management practices.
newTitle: Hyderabad Theatre Issued Notice After Deadly Pushpa 2 Premiere Stampede

title: Kapil Sharma BREAKS Silence About 'Insulting' Atlee: ‘Watch And Decide By Yourself…’ - News18
summary:
Kapil Sharma BREAKS Silence About 'Insulting' Atlee: ‘Watch And Decide By Yourself…’

Date: December 17, 2024 Source: News18

Filmmaker Atlee Kumar appeared on ‘The Great Indian Kapil Show’ to promote his new film, but a question posed by Kapil sparked controversy. Kapil has denied any intention to insult Atlee and has encouraged viewers to watch the interaction themselves.

  • Atlee's participation on the show led to accusations against Kapil regarding an insulting comment about Atlee's appearance.
  • Kapil urged the public to judge the interaction for themselves instead of following social media narratives.
  • Atlee responded to the controversy with a positive message about judging people by their character, not their appearance.

Dear sir, can you pls explain me where n when I talked about looks in this video ? pls don’t spread hate on social media 🙏 thank you. (guys watch n decide by yourself, don’t follow any body’s tweet like a sheep). — Kapil Sharma (@KapilSharmaK9) December 17, 2024

title: Varun Dhawan and Keerthy Suresh’s remuneration for Baby John revealed - 123telugu
summary:
Varun Dhawan and Keerthy Suresh’s remuneration for Baby John revealed

Published on Dec 18, 2024 by 123telugu

Bollywood star Varun Dhawan and National Award-winning South actress Keerthy Suresh will soon be seen in the highly anticipated action drama, Baby John, an official remake of Theri.

  • Varun Dhawan received Rs 25 crore for his role.
  • Keerthy Suresh was paid Rs 4 crore.
  • Other cast remuneration included Jackie Shroff (Rs 1.50 crore), Rajpal Yadav (Rs 1 crore), Sanya Malhotra (Rs 1 crore), and Wamiqa Gabbi (Rs 40 lakhs).
  • Salman Khan has a special cameo, but his payment is undisclosed.
  • The film is produced by Atlee, Murad Khetani, and Jyoti Deshpande, with music by Tollywood composer Thaman.
  • Release date is set for December 25, 2024.
“Given their massive popularity across the country, both Varun and Keerthy have reportedly been paid whopping remuneration.”

In conclusion, the financial figures associated with the star cast of Baby John reflect their significant market value and the film's high expectations.
newTitle: Varun Dhawan and Keerthy Suresh’s remuneration for Baby John revealed

title: Pushpa 2 The Rule box office collection day 13: Allu Arjun film shows no sign of slowing down, collects ₹950 crore - Hindustan Times
summary:
Pushpa 2 The Rule Box Office Collection Day 13: Allu Arjun's Pushpa Raj Continues Its Wildfire Effect

Date: Dec 17, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

The box office collection of 'Pushpa 2: The Rule' has crossed ₹950 crore in just 13 days, continuing its strong performance with minimal competition.

  • The film has maintained its momentum at the box office even in its second week, earning ₹21.33 crore on its second Tuesday.
  • Pushpa 2 had a total collection of ₹950.38 crore, with a significant portion generated from the Hindi-dubbed version.
  • The film features Allu Arjun, Rashmika Mandanna, and Fahadh Faasil and is directed by Sukumar.
  • Pushpa 2 has already crossed the ₹1000-crore mark worldwide, ranking it among the top 10 highest-grossing Indian films ever.
“Pushpa 2 had a 21.00 percent Telugu occupancy and 18.08 percent Hindi occupancy.”

The film's success comes as Allu Arjun faced controversy due to an incident involving the death of a fan at the premiere, for which he was briefly arrested.

title: Shatrughan Sinha claps back at Mukesh Khanna for questioning Sonakshi Singha’s upbringing: ‘Who has appointed him the guardian of the Hindu religion?’ - The Indian Express
summary:
Shatrughan Sinha Responds to Mukesh Khanna's Criticism of Sonakshi Sinha

Publication Date: December 2024
Source: The Indian Express

Shatrughan Sinha has come to the defense of his daughter, Sonakshi, after Mukesh Khanna criticized her for not knowing an answer related to the Ramayana during a game show.

  • Shatrughan Sinha questioned Mukesh Khanna's qualifications to judge Sonakshi and challenged his authority in matters concerning Hindu beliefs.
  • He expressed pride in Sonakshi's achievements and stated that not knowing an answer does not define her as a Hindu.
  • Sonakshi criticized Khanna's focus on her during the incident, echoing Sinha's sentiments about parental values.
  • Mukesh Khanna later clarified that his intention was to address a generational shift in knowledge concerning Indian culture.
“Not answering a question on the Ramayan doesn’t disqualify Sonakshi from being a good Hindu. She doesn’t need a certificate of approval from anyone.” - Shatrughan Sinha

The public exchange highlights the ongoing discussion about cultural knowledge in modern society, as well as the responsibilities of parents in imparting this knowledge to younger generations.
newTitle: Shatrughan Sinha Responds to Mukesh Khanna's Criticism of Sonakshi Sinha

title: Mahira Khan recalls being offered Heeramandi in first meeting with Sanjay Leela Bhansali: ‘It was in works but…' - Hindustan Times
summary:
Mahira Khan recalls being offered Heeramandi fifteen years ago when she was not even an actor, shares details of her first meeting with Sanjay Leela Bhansali.

Date: Dec 17, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

In a recent interview, Mahira Khan shared her experience of being offered a role in Heeramandi during her first meeting with filmmaker Sanjay Leela Bhansali, a significant moment in her early career.

  • Mahira Khan was introduced to Bhansali through a friend while attending a wedding in Mumbai.
  • She remembered Bhansali looking for a Pakistani actress for a project, leading to her impromptu meeting.
  • During the meeting, she was praised by Bhansali, who was interested in casting her for Heeramandi.
  • Despite the excitement, political issues prevented her from accepting the role at the time.
  • Heeramandi has since been released on Netflix, depicting the lives of courtesans during the British Raj.
“What a man he is! So creative and a genius. He said, 'Can you wipe your lipstick off?' I said, 'I'm not wearing any lipstick'.”

Ultimately, Mahira's candid approach and desire for honesty regarding her marital status played a crucial role in her career decisions.
newTitle: Mahira Khan Discusses Her Early Opportunities with Sanjay Leela Bhansali

Mukesh Khanna has responded to Sonakshi Sinha's backlash regarding his comments on her upbringing and knowledge of the Ramayana. He clarifies that his intention was not malicious and emphasizes a need for deeper knowledge in today's generation.

summary:

The release of Pushpa 2 has provided valuable insights for the upcoming film, Game Changer. Key takeaways highlight the importance of ticket pricing and premiere strategies, suggesting a shift in approach.

  • High ticket prices for Pushpa 2 indicated negative audience reception.
  • The paid premieres scheduled for Pushpa 2 did not yield expected results.
  • Game Changer should consider avoiding paid premieres to optimize attendance.
  • Setting competitive ticket prices is crucial, learning from Pushpa 2's experience.
“If a sequel with a good combination couldn’t have the best of premieres, then it’s better for other films to happily stay away from it.”

In conclusion, the makers of Game Changer can benefit from analyzing Pushpa 2's approach to ticket pricing and premieres to enhance their film's success.

title: This is Where Things Backfired For Allu Arjun - M9
